formulas.description: Formula to convert ship to street to single line
formulas.name: ShiptoStreet
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS( {!$Record.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet}, SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) ) , TRIM( LEFT( {!$Record.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet}, FIND( SUBSTITUTE( $Label.Line_Break_Formula_Finder , "-", "" ) , {!$Record.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet}, - 1 ))) , {!$Record.Onsite_Contact__r.MailingStreet})
